body.p: Does the body plane shown depict the sagittal, transverse or coronal plane?

image.alt: Plane running from the top of the head down, separating the body into front and back sections.

response.feedback: Correct. In fact, because this divides the body into equal portions, it is known as the mid-sagittal plane.
Incorrect. The transverse plane divides into top (superior) and bottom (inferior) portions.
Incorrect. The coronal plane is between the anterior (front) and posterior (back) sections.

part.hint: In this example, the plane separates the body down the middle into mostly mirror images.
